alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:20PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Morgan, west central Washington and northeastern Adams Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 620 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Twelve-Mile Corner, or 13 miles south of Fort Morgan, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gary, Hoyt, Twelve-Mile Corner, Adena School, Woodrow and Adena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Morgan County; Washington County
